name: GetProjectEmployeeById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Project employee by id/number.

$ul:
**address**: Employee's home address.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**canApprove**: Shows if the employee can approve for example time entries.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**canInvoice**: Shows if the employee can take for example a time entry to the invoice process.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**city**: Employee's city of residence.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**costPriceAfter**: The cost after the cut off date.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**costPriceBefore**: The cost before the cut off date.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**cutOffDate**: By default, salesPriceBefore is used, unless a cutoffDate and salesPriceAfter is determined. The cutoffDate serves the purpose of choosing which date the salesPriceAfter shall apply from. It can be null if only salesPriceBefore should apply.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: true
**employeeType**: Employee types:

**groupNumber**: The number of the employee group that this employee belongs.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**isBarred**: Shows if the employee can be registered on or is barred.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**isUser**: Shows if the employee is also a user.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**name**: Name of the employee.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the project employee.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**salesPriceAfter**: The sale price after the cut off date.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**salesPriceBefore**: The sale price before the cut off date.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**userId**: User id of the employee if it's a user.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**zipCode**: Employee's zip code.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logId**: The unique log identifier of the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.
